ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 954
ygData.msgSnippet: Kerudor We did  something like a total of 6 weeks straight in PoA every Thursday up until last week. Several of our members needed one thing or the other from
ygData.messageBody:
Kerudor
 
We did  something like a total of 6 weeks straight in PoA every Thursday up until last week. Several of our members needed one thing or the other from there. Most of the first couple of weeks were for getting keys for those who didnt have em  me being one of em lol.  I would love to be see our guild do a weekend long raid unfortunately  a good portion of our members myself included tend to have to work on the weekends so we opted to have our raid nights on Thursdays seeing as most of our members are available to raid on that night.
 
Thanks for the compliments as well.  And the Pink Barb is actually our Guild Leader.  Our Trade Meister Suggested that Eezeytee dye his armor for an April Folls Joke and Tee being the  guy that he is agreed.  He ran around all day  in that armor and was shoing his "Feminine Side" to everyone.  It was funnier than all get out that day lol
 
Halyburton
----- Original Message -----
From: William Tillman
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, February 15, 2004 14:56
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 954

Hallyburton -

 

Excellent job on the flash....as someone previou said, the only problem I had with it was the red text, but hell, it was your first flash movie, so I wont crucify you for that hehe. Some of the things you guys are doing on the movie brings back some memories. Noone on my server goes to PoA anymore, and I miss it. I have the quest sandals and haste belt for monks from PoA and had a blast getting them. Now people just take a group of lvl 65s up to get epic parts. No weekend long raids or anything like that. But anyway, enough of this old fart (since 1999 lol) reminiscing. Good job, excellent choice of music, and great screenshots. Love the pink Barb at the end lol.

 

Kerudor Cooterking

63rd lvl MonkyShiner

Tunare server <Cohesion>
